title: Ward Skin Name from Hextech Box bug?
body:
So I got a ward skin from a Hextech Chest the name of the skin is messed up. Lol. Is this normal? 

[loot_name_ward_skin_rental_5](http://imgur.com/a/eZ6fv?reg)

replies.body: This is a known issue that we're currently looking at.  This is just a display bug with the name, and some ward skins are also not selectable despite being unlocked on the account.  We'll have updates on this on our server[ status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)!
Yeah, I actually just got that yesterday and i decided to unlock it and it just vanished entirely. Same thing happened with a karma lvl 6 token.
